file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-23-00-04 - PASSENGER WARNING SIGNS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PASSENGER WARNING SIGNS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for deactivation and reactivation of the seat whose "No Smoking/Fasten Seat Belt" Sign is not readily legible. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY NO SMOKING/FASTEN SEAT BELT ALL 33-23-00-000-801-A SIGNS - DEACTIVATION NO SMOKING/FASTEN SEAT BELT ALL 33-23-00-400-801-A SIGNS - REACTIVATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-23-00 Page 1 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-00-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. NO SMOKING/FASTEN SEAT BELT SIGNS - DEACTIVATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to deactivate the seat (prevent its use) when the "No Smoking/Fasten Seat Belt" sign is not readily legible. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 243 Passenger Cabin 244 Passenger Cabin 253 Passenger Cabin 254 Passenger Cabin 263 Passenger Cabin 264 Passenger Cabin C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger Cabin H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Not applicable. I. Deactivation SUBTASK 040-002-A (1) Block and placard "DO NOT OCCUPY" the seat, as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-00 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-00-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. NO SMOKING/FASTEN SEAT BELT SIGNS - REACTIVATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to reactivate a seat that is blocked and placarded "DO NOT OCCUPY". B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 243 Passenger Cabin 244 Passenger Cabin 253 Passenger Cabin 254 Passenger Cabin 263 Passenger Cabin 264 Passenger Cabin C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger Cabin H. Reactivation SUBTASK 440-002-A (1) Remove the "DO NOT OCCUPY" placard from the seat, and make the seat available. I. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Not applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-23-00 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
